attributes.action: Private parking companies to charge 24 hours maximum fee penalties in car parks
attributes.additional_details:
YOU MAY RECOGNISE ONE OR TWO OF THESE PRIVATE PARKING NAMES: 
PCN Parking Services, PARKING EYE, ANPR Ltd, APCOA, AS Parking Ltd, Civil Enforcement Ltd, Capital2Coast, CP Plus, District Enforcement, Euro Car Parks, Excel Parking Services, G24 Ltd, High view Parking, Met Parking Services, National Car Parks Ltd, NCP, Parking Collection Services, PCM (UK) LtD, Smart Parking Ltd, UKCPS, Vehicle Control Services LtD, Vinci Park Services, Premier Parking Solutions, Meteor Parking, BW Legal.
attributes.background: Private car parks such as those in hospitals, hotels, motorway service stations, supermarkets have been issuing parking charges average of £100 for overstaying. The Government should reduce the maximum  charge to what it will cost to park for 24 hours and not the extortionate charges.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of car park owners.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government or Parliament to regulate private car park operators if that is something you would like to see.
